title: G2 Names Similarweb in Top Software Lists | Similarweb
description: G2's 2023 software awards are out and Similarweb features on five of the lists - read on to find out why we were named as a top global software company
content: HomeBlogUpdatesAnnouncementsSimilarweb Features in G2’s Top Software Lists for 2023 Updates Similarweb Features in G2’s Top Software Lists for 2023 Start your free trial by Adelle Kehoe , Director of Content Marketing 2 Min. February 21, 2023 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic We are absolutely delighted to share that Similarweb has been featured in, not one, not two, but five of G2’s top software lists for 2023! G2’s software lists are a collection of the top global companies and products in the software industry. They are compiled based on reviews, ratings, and satisfaction scores from G2’s community of real, verified users. Similarweb scoops five global awards Here at Similarweb, one of our core values is innovation. We constantly strive to ensure our datasets are the best, and in 2022 we added over 100 new features, most of which were requested directly from our users. We’re thrilled that these improvements and innovations helped our customers, and this has been reflected in the G2 lists, where we scooped the following awards: #47 Global Software Companies #12 Marketing Products #56 Software Products #12 Products for Enterprise #34 Products for Mid-Market Digital intelligence supports businesses through uncertain times Navigating the turbulent markets, economy and landscape of 2022 was hard. Similarweb’s unrivaled data and digital intelligence equipped businesses with more actionable insights than ever to support smart growth during difficult times. “We are honored to be chosen for these awards,” said Similarweb CEO Or Offer. “This recognition is a significant milestone for our team and we are delighted to be included in five of G2’s top software lists for 2023. We have worked hard over the years to provide industry-leading software that helps businesses make informed decisions about their digital marketing strategies, and we’re thrilled that users recognize this”. Real users, real impact Enough from us, here are some of the impactful quotes from our G2 page that contributed to our awards: Super useful data and insight for decision making “Similarweb has a vast array of tools that help evaluate trends and traffic on the web. You can set up custom queries to look at competition, acquisition channels, marketing strategies and website traffic, which can be very useful in determining performance and setting benchmarks. “You can choose from a set of dashboards to monitor competition and completely customize it, slicing the data however is relevant to you.” Read G2 review here A comprehensive market intelligence tool “Similarweb is an incredibly comprehensive market intelligence tool, which is great for analyzing website performance against industry competitors and whole industries. Each section of the platform has useful features from Competitive Research to Market Analysis, providing users with all of the information you need.” Read G2 review here SimilarWeb provides competitive benchmarking we can’t get anywhere else “SimilarWeb has allowed us to peer behind the curtain of our competitors’ actions and see what strategies are working for them. The keyword tools also help us to identify keywords before they spike and tailor our content to match.” Read G2 review here We’re excited to keep powering and empowering businesses with digital intelligence – watch out for more exciting innovations from Similarweb in 2023. by Adelle Kehoe Director of Content Marketing Adelle is passionate about content and has a strong background in content creation, SEO, and marketing. She has helped companies of all sizes enhance their online presence. Related Topics: Announcements This post is subject to Similarweb legal notices and disclaimers.
